item.title: Meta set to alter labels for AI-generated images - The Jerusalem Post
item.description:
1. Meta set to alter labels for AI-generated images  The Jerusalem Post
  2. Instagram’s “Made with AI” label swapped out for “AI info” after photographers’ complaints  The Verge
  3. 'I feel violated': Some Utah artists upset about Meta AI scraping their art  KSL.com
  4. Instagram Changes ‘Made with AI’ Label to ‘AI Info’ After Widespread Backlash  PetaPixel
